Utils

Class Utilities

  • java.lang.Object
    • Utils.Utilities
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Utilities
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

    Utilities Class

    This class provides several miscellaneous utilities that are used in the program.

    This includes, reading and parsing CSV files, converting dates to days, checking time validities

    See Also:

      • determineValidTime

        public static boolean determineValidTime(java.lang.String start,
                                         java.lang.String end,
                                         java.lang.String classroom,
                                         java.lang.String Day)
                                  throws java.text.ParseException
        This function returns a boolean value determing whether there is an overlap between a bookings
        Parameters:
        start - start time of booking
        end - end time of booking
        classroom - classroom attempting to be booked
        Day - Day on which booking is for
        Returns:
        return boolean true or false
        Throws:
        java.text.ParseException - throws error when there is an error in string parsing

        course2 - course 2
